Mahmoud Abu Warda (; born 31 May 1995) is a Palestinian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Libyan Premier League club Al-Ittihad and the Palestine national team.
Career statistics
International goals
: As of match played on 6 September 2023. Palestine score listed first, score column indicates score after each Abu Warda goal.
